server.dataBaseAccessClasses

Class ValueDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.dataBaseAccessClasses.ValueDAO

  • public class ValueDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Any part of the system that needs to access information about Values in the database will go through the ValueDAO class.
    Author:
    isai

    • Constructor Summary

      ValueDAO(DataBaseConnector database)
      constructor that receives an object DataBase

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addRow(Value value)
      It adds a row to the table in the database; If successful, it returns true.
      boolean deleteRow(int rowID)
      It deletes a row in the table If it succeeds it returns true.
      boolean editRow(int rowID, Value value)
      It edits and updates a row If it succeeds, it returns true.
      Values getAllRows()
      It gets all the rows in the table If it succeeds, it returns a Values object that contains several Field objects If it fails, it outputs FAILED
